dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: recyclable paper; paper for recycling; paper waste; recovered paper; paper scrap; secondary paper
recyclable paper; paper for recycling; paper waste; recovered paper; paper scrap; secondary paper
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow description for 'waste paper, sorted' includes the processed level of the waste paper, which in this case is sorted to separate different types or grades. It also indicates the technical aspects such as the treatment it has received, standard compliance, and quality level. Usage information may refer to the purposes for which the sorted waste paper can be repurposed or recycled. Production route and educt name describe the origin of the waste paper and the initial raw material respectively. Furthermore, the description specifies if the sorted waste paper is part of a production or consumption mix and its availability location, which can be 'to consumer' or 'at plant', all details provided separately and delineated by commas.

产品流程描述涉及‘废纸，已分类’的处理水平，此处指将不同种类或等级的废纸进行分拣。它还显示了技术方面的信息，如废纸接受的处理、标准合规性以及质量等级。使用信息可能指的是分类废纸可以被重新利用或回收的目的。生产路线和原料名称描述了废纸的来源及其最初的原材料。此外，描述还具体说明了分类废纸是生产还是消费混合物的一部分，以及其可用的地点，可能是‘面向消费者’或‘在工厂’，所有细节分别以逗号分开并详细说明。
